attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SCRAP THE LOW EMMISION ZONE BECAUSE HITTING THE PUBLICS POCKET IS GETTING OUT OF CONTROL. PLUS IT JUST ANOTHER EXCUSE TO HAVE A HOLD ON THE PUBLICS FREEDOM. AND IT ANOTHER TAX IN BRITAIN

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
